content: really sweet little snail which is guaranteed not to ruin your plants loved making this wee little snail really quick to make with very clear written instructions on how to make and put together a very firm favourite suitable for advanced beginner/intermediate level 4 page written pattern this pattern is my original pattern by purchasing this pattern you agree to the terms of use please do not claim this pattern as your own you may not sell or distribute the pattern or any part thereof without prior permission it is for personal use only it is permitted to make items from this pattern to sell for charitable purposes provided they meet safety guidelines and crochet at teri s is accredited
